sentences.en: Apart from a few swimmers, the rest of us stretched out on the bank to sunbathe.
sentences.cn: 除了几个人在游泳外，我们其他人伸开四肢躺在岸边晒日光浴。

sentences.en: Caution: Do not apply it before sunbathe.
sentences.cn: 注意事项:日 光浴前请勿使用.

sentences.en: If it is not too cold, the beach is a nice place to sit, relax and even sunbathe in the summer.
sentences.cn: 如果天气不太冷，坐在沙滩上是个不错的选择，放松甚至在夏天享受日光浴。

sentences.en: She can sunbathe and pretend she's in Spain.
sentences.cn: 她能照日光浴,想像着她是在西班牙.

sentences.en: She liked to sunbathe in the seclusion of her own garden.
sentences.cn: 她喜欢在自己僻静的花园里晒日光浴.

sentences.en: Those who love to sunbathe are also welcome to do so in this fashion.
sentences.cn: 那些喜欢晒日光浴的人也欢迎以这种方式来做.

sentences.en: Tourists sunbathe and frolic in the ocean.
sentences.cn: 游客晒着日光浴在海水里嬉戏。

trans.tran_en: to sit or lie outside in the sun, especially in order to become brown
